title: Complete R. A. Lafferty collection (SS + novels)
description:
For the first time, every R. A Lafferty short story and novel in one convenient package! These hard-to-find volumes represent the life's work of one of the most respected sci-fi authors ever, lauded by writers from Neil Gaiman to Gene Wolfe.

Contents:

Annals of Klepsis
Apocalypses
Archipelago
Arrive at Easterwine
Aurelia
Best Short Stories of R. A. Lafferty
Dotty
East of Laughter
Fourth Mansions
Half a Sky
More Than Melchisedech
Not to Mention Camels
Okla Hannali
Past Master
Serpent's Egg
Sindbad, the Thirteenth Voyage
Space Chantey
Summa Risus: Collected Non-Fiction of R. A. Lafferty
The Devil is Dead
The Elliptical Grave
The Flame is Green
The Man Who Talled Tales: Complete Short Stories of R. A. Lafferty
The Reefs of Earth

parsed.dn: Complete R. A. Lafferty collection (SS   novels)
